page.title: 20Moy Thanks
page.content: Memories "I realise it would fill a book to try to tell about all the laughs and fun and pieces of jam we got for rewards and to try to describe the feelings we shared for all the birds, beasts and beauty which surrounds us. I hope this continues forever." THANKS TO _ Lachlan Mackintosh of Mackintosh Mrs C. McLean (Acting Headteacher) Mr Smith _ Forester Jackie_the_Post Parents of Schoolchildren Community of Moy Moy Primary School Children Nicola Beattie Paul Cameron Joanne Fraser David Smith Kevin Cameron Dawn Fraser Deborah Fraser Cameron Beattie Helen Smith Diane Fraser Ian Fraser Karen Cameron Ewen Beaton Robert Fraser Ross Fraser Stephen Hendry Mark MacLeod Headteacher Alison Boyd
